title: THE METROID ROM COLLECTION (120) [zip] [w/ Mac Emulators]
description:
Here is my collection of 120 roms for Metroid which span multiple consoles. [359.2 MB]

[This is to replace my almost identical previous upload with a compressed zip file for faster downloads.]

In addition to every Metroid rom I could find I've added other roms that have Metroid-themed hacks.

Also included are the newest versions of emulators for the Mac.
